text: Buonocore is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alfonso Buonocore (born 1933), Italian swimmer and water polo player *Carmelo Buonocore (1912–1982), Italian footballer *Fabrizio Buonocore (born 1977), Italian water polo player *Giovanni Battista Buonocore (1643–1699), Italian Baroque painter *Louis T. Buonocore, American criminal (securities fraud)Mike Casswell, "Ontario OTC-BB scheme draws US Fraud Charges,", Stockwatch Daily, October 3, 2016Matthew Heller, "Two Charged With Stem Cell Microcap Fraud", CFO, September 22, 2015"Woburn Promoter Charged in Stock Price Manipulation Scheme" *Nino Buonocore (born 1958), Italian singer-songwriter *Pasquale Buonocore (1916–2003), Italian water polo player ==References== Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Buonocore
